document.full_text: a wind-whipped wildfire forced the evacuation of 9,500 homes southeast of denver on thursday just as firefighters were gaining the upper hand on a separate blaze that has burned stubbornly for five days west of the city.
document.title: colorado wildfire forces evacuation of 9,500 homes
lines_and_colors: a wind-whipped wildfire forced the evacuation of 9,500 homes southeast of denver on thursday just as firefighters were gaining the upper hand on a separate blaze that has burned stubbornly for five days west of the city.
